com.smartdevicesdk.barcodescanner.core

接口 IViewFinder

  • 所有已知实现类:
    ViewFinderView

    public interface IViewFinder

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      android.graphics.Rect getFramingRect()
      Provides Rect that identifies area where barcode scanner can detect visual codes Note: This rect is a area representation in absolute pixel values.
      int getHeight()
      Height of a View that implements this interface Note: this is already implemented in View, so you don't need to override method and provide your implementation
      int getWidth()
      Width of a View that implements this interface Note: this is already implemented in View, so you don't need to override method and provide your implementation
      void setupViewFinder()
      Method that executes when Camera preview is starting.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setupViewFinder

        void setupViewFinder()
        Method that executes when Camera preview is starting. It is recommended to update framing rect here and invalidate view after that.
        For example see: ViewFinderView.setupViewFinder()

      • getFramingRect

        android.graphics.Rect getFramingRect()
        Provides Rect that identifies area where barcode scanner can detect visual codes

        Note: This rect is a area representation in absolute pixel values.
        For example:
        If View's size is 1024x800 so framing rect might be 500x400

        返回:
        Rect that identifies barcode scanner area

      • getWidth

        int getWidth()
        Width of a View that implements this interface

        Note: this is already implemented in View, so you don't need to override method and provide your implementation

        返回:
        width of a view

      • getHeight

        int getHeight()
        Height of a View that implements this interface

        Note: this is already implemented in View, so you don't need to override method and provide your implementation

        返回:
        height of a view
